interfaces

Interface Weapon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, Moveable, Pickupable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Gun, MeleeWeapon, Projectile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GunEntity, MeleeWeaponEntity, ProjectileEntity, WeaponEntity

    public interface Weapon
extends Pickupable

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        boolean attack(Entity victim)
        Deals damage to a given entity
        Parameters:
        victim - the entity to attack
        Returns:
        true if damage dealt, else false

        int getBaseDamage()
        Gets the base damage (without modifier) of the weapon
        Returns:
